name: Lesser Transmogrification
effect: The mage can turn a single liquid substance into a single solid substance, and vice-versa. As with Matter 2 Transmute Water and Matter 3 Transmute Earth, except that now the mage can mix and match liquid and solid states, turning water into stone or wood into ink. (This spell cannot turn objects into impossible substances, such as wood into "liquid wood.")

rotes.roteDescription: Mages of the Silver Ladder use this rote to remodel a rival's sanctum, perhaps transforming furniture into oil and sturdy walls into paper, teaching others that nothing is safe from their Art.
